text: Na oguṇṭhito antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na oguṇṭhito antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 24. I will not sit with my head covered in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๒๔. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่คลุม (ศีรษะ) นั่งในละแวกบ้าน”
24. I shall not sit with head covered in inhabited areas: this is a training to be done.
